ocr_qa.question: What is the drawing scale indicated in the title block?
evidence: The 'Scale @ Arch E1' field in the title block reads '1"=64''.

ocr_qa.question: What sheet number is shown for this drawing?
evidence: The sheet number 'P-8.02' appears at the bottom-right corner of the title block.

ocr_qa.question: When was the issued date for the 'Planned development permit' revision?
evidence: The planned development permit revision was issued on '08/09/11'.

spatial_qa.question: Are the access blocks positioned symmetrically across opposite sides of the ring?
evidence: The access blocks are not positioned symmetrically across opposite sides of the ring.

spatial_qa.question: Where is the General notes section located in the drawing?
spatial_qa.answer: The top right corner of the drawing.
evidence: The General notes section is located in the top right corner of the drawing.

counting_qa.question: How many labeled access blocks are distributed around the building ring on this sheet?
evidence: Nine rectangular access/core blocks are evenly positioned around the circular building ring.

counting_qa.question: How many radial division lines extend from the center to the ring?
evidence: Eight dashed radial lines extend outward from the central point to the building ring.

counting_qa.question: How many section view callouts are present in the drawing?
evidence: Three section view callouts are present in the drawing. These are labeled as 'P-10.00', 'P-10.01/10.02', and 'P-10.03'

counting_qa.question: How many consulting firms are included on this floor plan?
evidence: Foster + Partners, Arup, OLIN, KIER & WRIGHT, and alta

comparison_qa.question: Which quadrant of the circular building has more core access?
comparison_qa.answer: Quadrant 1 or the top right corner.
evidence: Quadrant 1 has more core access than the others.
